summary:
I loved this interview and showcase of Lynn Hill on Climbing Gold.  She describes the beauty and challenge of movement in rock climbing so well in this clip:



But the whole point of climbing in general is to adapt yourself to the rock in the most clever way that you can using whatever you were given, your body size, finger size.  None of that is as important as your mind and your solutions and your ability to persevere...
title: Lynn Hill: Climbing comes down to cleverness and perseverance

summary: I met some friends up on Burnside last night, and planned to ride home with Al from there, so I decided to take my Zizzo Forte: We could meet up, hang out, and I could fold it up and stick it in the trunk and ride home with Al once
title: Zizzo Folder Notes

summary: Presently sponsored by: 1Password Extended Access Management: Secure every sign-in for every app on every device. It's not a green screen.  It's just a weird a weird hotel room in Pittsburgh, but it did make for a cool backdrop for this week's video...
title: Weekly Update 419

summary: After a long battle with health issues the past few years, my mom has transitioned to end-of-life care.  She’s had a long and rich life, and given her health, making it past her 90th birthday was a gift.  It’s hard to say goodbye, but I’m grateful having the chance to do so...
I lucked out in the family I was born into and the one I married into.  Lots of love.  No drama
title: Family Ties

summary: I was going to do this exhaustive retrospective but it turns out that my publisher in Brazil did it for me, much briefer, and with moving pictures: And, yup, that about sums it up.  Well-attended events, a lot of signing books, tons of delicious food, and even some time to do a little tourism, particularly […]
title: Me in Brazil

summary: "If I were you, I would. " Do you sometimes hear that.  I think it's such an incredibly stupid thing to say...
title: You're Not Me
